data.text:
This is the 4th time I've stayed in this hotel and hopefully not the last. All the staff are so helpful and friendly. I usually request the same room and the manager has always done his best to oblige.
The food is a good is a good standard and there's plenty to choose from. 
The house reef is brilliant to snorkel from or dive. 
My only one grumble is the gym. I usually use the gym every evening. The equipment has improved over the years with the addition of dumbells, however there is green flooring like fake grass which has been there for years. It gets hoovered however it would be very difficult to clean. 
It would be great to see something more hygienic on the floor like linoleum or floor boards which can be mopped easily. 
There is also no aircon, only fans which just circulate hot air. 
The gym is the only downfall to whole hotel. Sorry to raise this but I am a bit of a gym goer on holiday. The rest of the hotel excels in every other area and I'll always return.
data.title: Another amazing holiday...

data.text:
Second visit to the Grand Oasis in a few weeks!! 
I’ve got to say the service was excellent.

We were up graded by Mohammed to one of the refurbished rooms and how lovely it was, very clean, beds very comfortable and nothing was too much trouble for house keeping!! Lovely view of the sea and beautifully kept gardens.

Pool area:
Is kept very clean!! The lads who hand out towels are great Esmail looked after us so well a great asset to the hotel, very approachable and so polite.

The restaurant: 
The food is very good, even if you’re a fussy eater you will always find something to tempt the taste buds!! Plenty of fish, chicken and the beef was cooked so perfectly. They do vary it quite a lot gorgeous cooked prawns and lovely sweet & Sour
The food is always well presented and they take the utmost care a lot of pride. Ahmed you should be commended.
We were well looked after by the waiting staff who never stop!! John, Baseem always took care of us.

Animation:
Always had something on water Aerobics, water polo, yoga.
Always had something on in the evening for an hour or so but then you can go into Soho Square or just sit round and chat.

Bar service:
Amghad and his staff second to none well looked after, you can always have a laugh with them and they are good fun!! Just what you want on holiday. 

The hotel is close to Soho Square a shuttle bus goes from 8pm so if you don’t want to walk or you can’t it’s ideal.

Would I stay again?
Yes without a shadow of doubt.
If it’s your first time to Egypt give it a go you won’t be disappointed.
There are a lot of other nationalities but I didn’t mind that at all.

I would also like to thank the GM Mr Tarek who runs a very well organised hotel.

Special thanks again for looking after us 
Muhommed
John
Amghad 
Baseem
Esmail

See you again in the not so distant future
data.title: Excellent Stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your review.
We are sorry if you found some wear and tear in your room.  
Our team tries to enjoy time for all guests. We will continue to do everything we can to speed up and improve our customer service delivery. We hope that you will allow us to better serve you soon.
Sincerely,  
team of Grand Oasis Resort
owner_response.author: Guest Relation

data.text:
4* The Hotel is clean and the beds are comfy. A short trip from the airport too. 

I visited with my mum for a quick getaway before I get married to my fiancé this year.

Check-in was smooth and we were shown how to use the safe. The safe won’t fit a laptop in, so keep this in mind. Only small items. 

Bassem, the restaurant Manager is friendly and more than happy to help. Tables were cleaned promptly so even when busy, we could find a seat. 

The only thing I would complain about is one member staff in the restaurants. His behaviour was disrespectful. The male staff, only there in the evening, behind the pasta station behaving inappropriately.  Laughing at me speaking to his colleague in a different language and then went out of his way to step out from his station and get behind me. Got a good look at my behind to check if he could see beneath my dress and looked me from bottom to top. Then laughed. 

He is lucky my fiancé was not there as he would have complained. 

Absolutely disgraceful behaviour. The same guy discriminated and only gave us a few shrimps on seafood night whilst he gave 2 Russian ladies, a whole plate food each. 

This ruined our night.

Other than that. The restaurants have plenty of fresh salads and fruits to choose from. Highly recommend the rice pudding in the morning and fresh orange slices from the dessert section. 

There was a bit of a language barrier at the towel hut at the pool. It turns out you can have fresh towels once a day so make sure you’re done with your towels before handing them in. 

Visiting in March, the big pool can feel quite cold to start with but once you are in and get moving it’s quite refreshing. 

The staff at Reception are happy to help in regards to a late check out. It usually costs $24 to extend your check out time to 3pm. 

The hotel gym was small but did the job and is open from 9am-8pm. 

Soho Square is an 11-minute walk down from the hotel or you can get a free shuttle between the hours of 8 pm-11 pm. They arrive every half hour. You can find many shops that sell ‘designer copy’ clothes, shoes and bags. 
Be careful though, as they hike up prices if you are from the UK. I’d recommend visiting Cotton House as Adem, the shop owner was very reasonable. 

Overall, I was pleased with my stay here at Grand Oasis. I would recommend staying here if visiting Sharm El Sheikh but I would be careful of the evening staff’s behaviour, especially if you are a female travelling alone or without a partner with you.
data.title: 4* Clean hotel with all amenities

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
We would like to thank you for taking the time, bringing to our attention that some of your accommodation elements failed to meet your respectful expectations.
Please rest assured that all your points of disappointment were carefully investigated and placed into our consideration for measuring and improving our service standards in the future.
Thank you.With the kindest regards, Team of Grand Oasis Resort
owner_response.author: Guest Relation

data.text: Lovely and comfortable stay, nice hotel with nice view and location.lively hotel,big swimming pool with warm water.beautiful green gardens . There is a great variety of delicious food and snacks.The hotel is near Soho Square which is a lovely place.
data.title: Lively and nice hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest ,Thank you so much for taking time to share your experience. It is wonderful that you enjoyed your stay at  Grand Oasis Resort. We are looking forward to your future stays.
Best regards, team of Grand Oasis Resort
owner_response.author: Guest Relation

data.text: it's a great place to relax!  Impressive staff who are always ready to help, comfortable and clean rooms with a great view of the sea or the garden. The hotel has a great location - close to the beach and not far from the city center.  there is also a swimming pool on the territory of the hotel.  the Animators team is very cheerful and energetic. They always know how to entertain guests and create a positive atmosphere.  They organize a variety of entertainment and games for both adults and children, so that everyone can find something interesting for themselves. The animators are very friendly and welcoming, always ready to help and support a fun atmosphere
data.title: great vacation

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,
Thank you for choosing the Grand Oasis Resort for your holiday.
We are grateful that you took a moment from your valuable time to post your excellent review.
We wish to have the pleasure welcoming you soon for further great memories. Team of Grand Oasis Resort
owner_response.author: Guest Relation
